channel.title: Dodian Remade "A Good Kind Of Remake"
channel.description:
[center][center][b]THREAD IN DEVELOPMENT[/b][/center][/center]
[center]What Was Dodian?[/center]
[center]Dodian was a very popular server That has hundreds of players playing dailly. The concept was simple and enjoyable and items and skills had their own challenge to obtain. It was shut down by Jagex for having a membership system that required players to pay monthly for features in game.[/center]
[center][center][b]UPDATES[/b][/center][/center]
[center]ADDED CAGE THIEVING ADDED FARMER THIEVING All DOORS WORKING[/center] [center]NPC SPAWNS SHOPS BOSSES UPDATE SKILLS[/center]

item.title: Dodian Remade "A Good Kind Of Remake"
item.dc:creator: @Basix Basix
item.description:
@Basix wrote:

You should post some pictures or something, otherwise don’t bother posting until you have some actual content.

Read full topic

wow nickypie must be a great coder! he’ll definitely be able to remake a server!!
[/quote]

why don’t you get back on your dads penis and ride out of here.[/quote]

Yeah, because that pre-formatted layout thread is just up there for decoration…

I repeat myself.

[quote author=Mintzy link=topic=598524.msg4209336#msg4209336 date=1359325907]

One does not simply, ‘remake Dodian.’

Not simple. Not Using devolution becuase it sucks. Im remaking it using a clean server.
[/quote]A clean server being?

One not dirtied by your 2 posts
[/quote]That makes absolutely no sense. I was simply asking what source you were using - that is a completely reasonable question for someone to ask.[/quote]

Clean Pi with the basic shit added and all the crappy skills that i have to re-do

item.title: Dodian Remade "A Good Kind Of Remake"
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I hate talking off topic like this, but you arguing isn’t going to help your server.

Just because you have text doesn’t mean it pertains to the topic at hand, if you are going to post a topic that you are working on, you should PM yourself the topic and work on it via PM so that you don’t have to make posts that have no general affiliation with the board.

Read full topic
item.source: Dodian Remade "A Good Kind Of Remake"

item.title: Dodian Remade "A Good Kind Of Remake"
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

runescape sucks:

What’s the point of posting a topic with no content? It’s called spam.

b. The material, including text and images, that constitutes a publication or document.

This is for my own reference. Did i ever ask for comments? It’s not spam because there is content in this topic, Plus who ever comments on it saying its spam is contradicting themselves because they are posting. You can Keep posting if you want it only helps me.

Read full topic
